inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with an eating disorder according to DSM-IV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Enrolled as a patient at Eriksbergsgarden, a clinic in Sweden offering specialized care for patients with an eating disorder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Attained a somewhat regular eating pattern consisting of at least three meals per day
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having physical or psychiatric complicating factors of such severity that these conditions needed to be addressed during the treatment period (12 weeks).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, with a history of treatment resistance.
